attributes.action: Muslim extremists to be deported immediatly to in view of recent event with soldier killing in london
attributes.additional_details: Owing to recent events regarding the murder of a british soldier by terrorist activist's We the signed request that measures to immediatly deport ,to their country of origin, any foriegn person that is known to be, or suspected of terrorist activities . If they refuse to divulge their country of origin or it can not be ascertained then they should be treated by the laws of the country of their native language. This should include the death penalty .
